title: CCRAS Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 02 Senior Research Fellow Posts
description: The Central Council for Research in Ayurvedic Sciences (CCRAS) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Senior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the BAMS can grab this chance and apply for the CCRAS Recruitment 2025 . Here we mentioned he age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can attend the walk-in at the address ...
